name: intro_text
label::english:
Hello my name is ______. I work for REACH/NPM. Together with ISCG, we are currently conducting a survey to understand the needs of Bangladeshi community living in Teknaf and Ukhiya upazillas. We would like to know more about the needs of your family and to what services you have access. We also may ask you a few questions about yourself personally and members of your household. The survey usually takes around an hour. 

Any information that you provide will be kept anonymous. This is voluntary and you can choose not to answer any or all of the questions if you want; you may also choose to quit at any point. Participation in the survey does not have any impact on whether you or your family receive assistance. However, we hope that you will participate since your views are important. Do you have any questions?

name: informed_consent
label::english: To ensure coordination of the needed assistance, we may share the collected information with other humanitarian agencies. However, your personal data will not be shared. Do you consent to participate in this survey?

name: consent_received
label::english: consent

name: HH_Characteristics
label::english: HH_Characteristics

name: respondent_age
label::english: Age of respondent
constraint_message::english: Interviewees must be over 18 years of age. If you are interviewing someone less than 18 years of age, please stop the interview.

name: respondent_gender
label::english: Gender respondent
constraint_message::english: Must interview someone of your same gender

name: hh_text
label::english: For the purposes of this conversation, we are considering people in your "household" to be the group of people who regularly eat from the same pot and share the same shelter. The head of household is the individual who makes decisions on behalf of the entire household. Do you have any questions?

name: respondent_hoh
label::english: Is the respondent the head of the household?

name: hoh_gender
label::english: [If no] What is the gender of the head of the household?

name: hoh_age
label::english: [If no] What is the age of the head of the household?

name: hoh_marital
label::english: What is the marital status of the head of household?

name: hh_size
label::english: Including yourself, how many people live in this household?

name: edu_highest
label::english: What is the highest grade of education anyone in this household has completed?

name: individual_information
label::english: Individual Information

name: repeat_introduction
label::english: I would now like to ask you some questions about the individuals living in this household, including yourself. I will ask some questions about each person, starting with the youngest.

name: inividual_info
label::english: Individual Information of Household Members

name: ind_age
label::english: Age of individual
hint::english: If the individual is under 1 year old, write "0"

name: ind_age_mo
label::english: How many months old is this child?

name: ind_gender
label::english: Gender of individual

name: ind_new_hh_member
label::english: INDIVIDUAL LEVEL: [if aged 0 to 17 years of age] Has this person joined your household within the past 6 months?

name: ind_relationship
label::english: What is the relationship of this person to the head of household?

name: ind_birth_place
label::english: INDIVIDUAL LEVEL CHILDREN < 1 YEAR OF AGE: Where was this child born?

name: ind_birth_place_other
label::english: Specify other.

name: ind_breastfed
label::english: INDIVIDUAL AGED 0 - 2: How long after birth was this child put to the breast?

name: ind_help_daily
label::english: INDIVIDUAL AGED 5 and more  : Does this individual regularly require another person to help him/her complete daily activities (such as eating, dressing, bathing, going to the toilet).

name: ind_help_daily_reason
label::english: [If yes] What is the reason?

name: ind_help_daily_reason_other
label::english: Specify other.

name: ind_work
label::english: [For individuals 5+ years old] During the past 30 days, has this person done any work to earn an income?

name: ind_work_situation
label::english: [If working and individual is under 18] Did their work involve any of the following situations?
hint::english: Read options out loud, select if "yes"

name: ind_illness
label::english: During the past 4 weeks, has this person had an illness serious enough to require medical treatment?

name: treatment_sought
label::english: [If yes] Did this person seek treatment for this illness?

name: treatment_location
label::english: [If yes] Where did they seek treatment?

name: treatment_location_other
label::english: Specify other.

name: ind_why_notreatment
label::english: [If no] Why not?
constraint: count-selected(.) <=3 and not((selected(., 'none ') or selected(., 'dntknow_prefer')) and count-selected(.) >=2)

name: ind_why_notreatment_other
label::english: Specify other.

label::english: Does this person smoke cigarettes?

name: over5_diarrhea
label::english: How many household members over 5, including yourself, have suffered from diarrhoea in the last two weeks?
